name: Eduardo Pool
body:
### About I'm 22 years old and I'm a Software Engineering graduated from the Universidad Autónoma de Yucatán and currently I´m working as a software developer at [NIC México](http://www.nic.com.mx). ### Interests I like read and learn about new technologies and especially about software architecture and software desing. Currently I'm learning Python with Django as web framework to develop "micro-apps" just to learn new programing languages, frameworks, databases, etc. *** ### Contact Email: eduardo_00797@hotmail.com
Twitter: [@eduardo_pool](https://www.twitter.com/eduardo_pool)
